ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Contains functions to help create log files.  The package aims to overcome the difficulty of the base R sink() command.  The log_print() function will print to both the console and the file log, without interfering in other write operations.

Contains functions to help create log files.  The package aims to overcome the difficulty of the base R sink() command.  The log_print() function will print to both the console and the file log, without interfering in other write operations.

name: r-logr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.9" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-logr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/logr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/logr/logr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9f2e3b948278af9dce892641e5ed308ae6b149c13a0d41674943aba1d009c990

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-common
    - r-withr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-common
    - r-withr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('logr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('logr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://logr.r-sassy.org
  dev_url: https://github.com/dbosak01/logr
  license: CC0-1.0
  summary: Contains functions to help create log files.  The package aims to overcome the difficulty of the base R sink() command.  The log_print() function will print to both the console and the file log, without interfering in other write operations.
  license_family: CC
  license_file:
    - LICENSE-CC0

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
